mapper.select: SELECT n.note_idx, n.title, n.titleimg AS thumbnail_img, n.view_count, rnk.like_count, ua.nickname AS author_name, n.category_idx FROM ( SELECT n.note_idx, n.category_idx, COUNT(l.likes_idx) AS like_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY n.category_idx ORDER BY (COALESCE(COUNT(l.likes_idx), 0) + n.view_count) DESC , n.create_at DESC) AS rn FROM note n LEFT JOIN likes l ON n.note_idx = l.note_idx GROUP BY n.note_idx, n.view_count, n.create_at, n.category_idx ) rnk JOIN note n ON rnk.note_idx = n.note_idx JOIN userAccount ua ON n.ac_idx = ua.ac_idx WHERE rnk.rn <= #{limit} ORDER BY rnk.category_idx, rnk.rn

SELECT note_idx AS noteIdx, title AS title, thumbnail_img AS thumbnailImg, view_count AS viewCount, like_count AS likeCount, author_name AS authorName FROM ( SELECT n.note_idx, n.title, n.titleimg AS thumbnail_img, n.view_count, ua.nickname AS author_name, COALESCE(lc.like_count, 0) AS like_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY n.create_at DESC) as rn FROM note n JOIN userAccount ua ON n.ac_idx = ua.ac_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT note_idx, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY note_idx ) lc ON n.note_idx = lc.note_idx WHERE n.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} ) ranked_notes WHERE rn <= #{limit} ORDER BY rn

SELECT note_idx, title, thumbnail_img, view_count, like_count, author_name FROM ( SELECT n.note_idx, n.title, n.titleimg AS thumbnail_img, n.view_count, ua.nickname AS author_name, COALESCE(lc.like_count, 0) AS like_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (COALESCE(lc.like_count, 0) + n.view_count) DESC, n.create_at DESC) as rn FROM note n JOIN userAccount ua ON n.ac_idx = ua.ac_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT note_idx, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY note_idx ) lc ON n.note_idx = lc.note_idx WHERE n.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} ) ranked_notes WHERE rn <= #{limit} ORDER BY rn

SELECT ac_idx, nickname FROM ( SELECT ua.ac_idx, ua.nickname,COUNT(f.follower_ac_idx) AS follower_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(f.follower_ac_idx) DESC, ua.created_at DESC) as rn FROM userAccount ua LEFT JOIN follows f ON ua.ac_idx = f.followed_ac_idx GROUP BY ua.ac_idx, ua.nickname, ua.created_at ) ranked_users WHERE rn <= #{limit} ORDER BY rn

SELECT ac_idx, nickname FROM ( SELECT u.ac_idx, u.nickname, COUNT(f.follower_ac_idx) AS follower_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(f.follower_ac_idx) DESC, u.created_at DESC) as rn FROM userAccount u LEFT JOIN follows f ON u.ac_idx = f.followed_ac_idx WHERE u.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} GROUP BY u.ac_idx, u.nickname, u.created_at, u.category_idx ) ranked_users_by_category WHERE rn <= #{limit} ORDER BY rn
